title: Help! The speed drops to 300kbs when i try to download lol on my macbook pro.
body: help help help, when i try to patch lol the speed drops to 300kps i dont know why and how to solve it. help help help

replies.body: It's really best to leave the patcher alone to do its thing, otherwise it could cause delays or corruption.  If you're getting errors or want to prep for future updates, your best bet would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to improve your comms to our patching service.
